entry.def: A sadistic person obtains pleasure from hurting other people and making them suffer physically or mentally.

example.ex: The prisoners rioted against mistreatment by sadistic guards...

example.ex: There was a sadistic streak in him.

means.word_mean: 1. deriving pleasure or sexual gratification from inflicting pain on another
